projects.title: Autodesk's Alloy Design System
projects.description: I led development on Autodesk’s Alloy React component library, building a robust, accessible, and type-safe design system used by more than 30+ feature teams. I created and maintained over 60 core components in React and TypeScript, improved Storybook documentation, and ensured design accuracy and accessibility throughout. My work established a consistent UI foundation for teams across the company that balanced full customization with ease of use.

projects.title: Pebble Calculator
projects.description: A tiny, whimsical calculator built in Godot with pixel art charm. Built from scratch — code, art, and animations — as a personal project to explore Godot and dip into pixel art creation.
